name: 10 Second Traffic
description:
Avoid vehicles in traffic as it gets progressively crazier every 10 seconds.

To Start Game:

Hit the A or D keys to start the game.

Game Info:

Every 10 seconds 2 traffic modifiers will appear where 1 can be selected by jumping into it.

Gain points by narrowly avoiding traffic.

Controls:

Use the A and D keys to move the character.

Use the Space key to make the character jump.

Use the R key to restart the game.

Fullscreen:

Click on the blue icon in the lower right of the game window to set the window to fullscreen.
